name: options
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stock_and_options.
Tool description: No. 1 rated U.S listed stock and options data provider with the lowest cost. The cloud based API has a simple interface and return easy to consume data in JSON format for options prices.
API description: Fetch stock and options data for a given stock ticker symbol.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which to fetch data.
